PAD_TriedTart.synopsis: Player eats a disguised Hag Tart, not knowing it's truly rotten and noxious. Brave (or foolish) players can eat the tart a second time, deepening their misery.

Dead.synopsis: This occurs with the hag when she is dead. In the cases she has the amulet, she is truly scary - no hint of the kindly grandmother we knew. She is alien and cruel and out for blood. In the cases she doesn't have the amulet, regular SWD.

Transformed.synopsis: The Hag is about to perform her eye-extraction and replanting on you. She is in her hag form in all its disgusting glory. Initially she's happy and feeling powerful -- but when she finds out your tadpole is Netherese, she becomes angry; not quite frightened, but anxious about having that magic in her home. She wants you out and has no more patience for you.

AD_TeleportSurrogateMother.synopsis: Fires as the hag grabs Mayrina and teleports to the lair OR Hag is injured and disappears from the fight alone.

AD_Occupied.synopsis: The hag has been blocked from conversation and another player has tried to speak to her.

PAD_Fled.synopsis: In the top node player has started combat with the hag in the teahouse. She has disappeared, fleeing to her lair. In the bottom, business has been conducted peacefully and she has left.

PAD_TriedTart_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TriedTart_0.text: Gods spare me, why did I think eating a second one was a good idea?

PAD_TriedTart_1.speaker: Player
PAD_TriedTart_1.text: What was in that tart? My stomach's doing somersaults...
PAD_TriedTart_1.context: NodeContext: For the Karlach line, 'Ster'ca' is a swear word in the infernal language. Should sound harsh and almost like a bark on the second syllable. Stir-KA

Dead_29.text: ARGH. Where is the knuckle-dragging gobshite that killed me?
Dead_29.context: NodeContext: You are the anrgiest you've evenr been as you look around, searching for the person who killed you.

Dead_7.text: You think this is the first time? I've found my way back before, and I will again.
Dead_7.context: NodeContext: Player has asked if being dead bothers you. You grit your teeth in rage but you know your sisters will avenge you.

Dead_12.text: And then I will make the cretin beg, plead, weep for what will always be denied...
Dead_12.context: NodeContext: Low cruel and threatening as you smile at the thought of the player being tortured,

Dead_22.text: Please. It's you lot who come to me. All you do is want - to be prettier, to be richer, to be loved.
Dead_22.context: NodeContext: Player has accused you of being cruel. You're mocking and condescending here, particularly on the 'to be prettier, etc.' making put on a voice?

Dead_65.text: People are their own worst enemies, petal. I just let them see it.
Dead_65.context: NodeContext: Said matter of factly. This is very cutting.

Dead_37.context: NodeContext: Player has asked if you have any regrets. This is an innuendo but should sound very threatening.

Dead_73.text: Didn't want... the girl... wanted her... babe.
Dead_73.context: NodeContext: Player has askecd what you wanted to do with Mayrina's child. You're condescending and cruel here.

Dead_66.text: ... was going to... eat it... and make a... hag daughter...

Dead_74.speaker: Player
Dead_74.text: Are you the only hag around here?

Dead_38.context: NodeContext: Player is trying to rub the fact that they killed you in your face. Big smile at their arrogance. Your sisters will rip them to pieces - and you can't wait.

Dead_3.speaker: Player
Dead_3.text: Where do you keep your valuables?

Dead_43.context: NodeContext: Player has asked if you have any regrets. Your angry fires up and you build to a murderous rage.

Dead_33.text: Not me... that's cruel. It's... people.

Dead_51.text: They want... and want... and want. I merely... give.

Dead_42.speaker: Narrator
Dead_42.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Dead_56.speaker: Narrator
Dead_56.text: *Ethel grits her teeth - struggling to speak, but the spell holds. She can't answer any more questions.*

Dead_60.speaker: Narrator
Dead_60.text: *A charm on the hag's body flashes a faint glow.*

Dead_75.context: NodeContext: You're the angriest you've ever been as you star into the eyes of the person who killed you.

Dead_64.text: You will bleed - you will choke on your own guts for this.

Dead_48.speaker: Player
Dead_48.text: You're quite lively for a corpse.

Dead_41.text: I'm a hag, you little snot - you think I didn't plan for this? Death and I are old friends.

Dead_11.text: But I won't be a corpse forever - that I can bloody promise you.

Dead_58.speaker: Player
Dead_58.text: Tell me the truth - what did you want with Mayrina?

Dead_47.text: I didn't want the girl, sweetie. I wanted her babe.
Dead_47.context: NodeContext: Player has askecd what you wanted to do with Mayrina's child. You're condescending and cruel here.

Dead_1.text: I would have gobbled it up and given birth to my very own hag daughter.

Dead_72.text: From my guts she would've come - my blood, my bile. It would have been glorious.
Dead_72.context: NodeContext: Elated at the thought, delighting in your cruelty. This should be proper scary.

Dead_27.speaker: Player
Dead_27.text: You're dead and I'm not. Deal with it.

Dead_5.speaker: Player
Dead_5.text: What deal did you make with Mayrina?

Dead_61.text: The brat's husband is dead. So sad.

Dead_4.text: She wanted me to bring him back to life. Little fool thought it would fix everything.

Dead_10.text: Only that I don't get to see the flesh melt from your bones, your guts dissolve, and your brain liquefy as you turn into a mind flayer.

Dead_24.text: You'll weep, you'll beg, you'll plead - anything to make it stop.  And once you stand tall, proud and tentacled?
Dead_24.context: NodeContext: Almost screaming at the end as your roar at your killer. The line is cut off at the end as the spell fails.

Dead_19.text: You'll butcher your friends and your loved ones LIKE THE ILLITHID SCUM YOU ARE.

Dead_2.speaker: Narrator
Dead_2.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Transformed_24.speaker: Narrator
Transformed_24.text: Not you, you eejit. I need someone with two eyes in their skull.

Transformed_65.speaker: Narrator
Transformed_65.text: There you are. Now where were we?
Transformed_65.context: NodeContext: Coy greeting - like you're about to have some fun but at the player's expense

Transformed_75.text: Much better. That human skin is fierce restrictive.
Transformed_75.context: NodeContext: You've just transformed into a towering monstrous hag. You are LOVING IT. Give your shoulders a luxurious stretch as you settle into your true form. You can't wait for the player's reaction. Like a cat purring as they stretch out,

Transformed_6.speaker: Player
Transformed_6.text: So the brothers were right. You are a hag.

Transformed_3.text: Indeed I am. And a fabulous one at that.
Transformed_3.context: NodeContext: Grinning and flirtatious but in a very  very creepy way

Transformed_58.text: Not many get to see a hag in all her glory. Consider yourself blessed.
Transformed_58.context: NodeContext: You are like a QUEEN, gesturing to yourself dramatically - loving the DRAMA of it all

Transformed_18.text: Now choose. Which eye will it be? Right or left?
Transformed_18.context: NodeContext: The big moment - pausing for dramatic effect, holds up hand for right/left

Transformed_34.text: Hold onto your knickers. This might sting a bit.
Transformed_34.context: NodeContext: You know this is going to sting a lot more than a bit. Big cruel smil. Flexing your fingers in delight.

Transformed_57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hag raises her forearm, fingers straightened to a point as if a blade and drives her hand towards the player's face. Rips her hand back, shot of the eye on her nail (maybe?) and then she either - kisses it gently or wave her hand over it (whatever is easier) and then jams it back into the player's head.

Transformed_71.text: Now - that wasn't so bad, was it?
Transformed_71.context: NodeContext: You know it was bad. Very bad. Satisfied smirk on your face.

Transformed_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hag took the left eye

Transformed_30.speaker: Player
Transformed_30.text: Check that your eye is still there.

Transformed_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot as player holds a hand up to their eyes - their chosen eye now shines bright green|NodeContext: Flirtatious

Transformed_16.text: Now - unless you want tentacles for a tongue, stay absolutely still.
Transformed_16.context: NodeContext: Down to business - you mean to uphold your end of the bargain and remove the parasite.Readying yourself to work some indredibly powerful magic.

Transformed_42.text: I've removed one of these buggers before - but it's a touch tricky.
Transformed_42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Perhaps flexing her taloned fingers, loosening up as she prepares to work some powerful magic. NodeContext: Down to business - you mean to uphold your end of the bargain and remove the parasite.Readying yourself to work some indredibly powerful magic. Perhaps elegantly stretching a little, glexing your fingers as you settle in.

Transformed_22.speaker: Narrator
Transformed_22.text: *The parasite squirms at the hag's words. Pain builds behind your eye.*
Transformed_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hag - low guttural murmuring noise as she moves around the player, swaying and dancing, her clawed fingers and hips swaying.

Transformed_9.speaker: Narrator
Transformed_9.text: *You feel the creature writhe as it's dragged towards your ear...*
Transformed_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player character puts hands over ears. Hag - moving faster.

Transformed_55.speaker: Narrator
Transformed_55.text: *...then it bites back, burrowing even deeper into your brain.*
Transformed_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player character grimaces in pain. Hag is pushed back -clutching her hand as if bitten, hissing in pain.

Transformed_31.context: NodeContext: Screeching in pain - jumping back and clutching and shaking your hand as if burned

Transformed_29.text: You little shit - you didn't tell me it was Netherese. I'm not touching that.
Transformed_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hag stands back, looking angry and afraid. She’s breathing heavily, cowering a little like a wounded animal.NodeContext: You srtand back looking angry and afraid - breathing heavily. Absolute VENOM in your voice.

Transformed_27.text: Filthy shadow magic - brings nothing but chains and misery.
Transformed_27.context: NodeContext: Half spitting this - disgust and hatred in your voice

Transformed_56.text: How could I have missed the stink? Like blood and piss congealing on my tongue. Bleh.
Transformed_56.context: NodeContext: Almost gagging at the end. Utter disgust in your voice.

Transformed_15.text: Someone's tampered with your parasite. That's likely why you've not turned yet.

Transformed_19.text: Bless us, you're as slow as a wet week. That thing has been touched by more than mind flayers.
Transformed_19.context: NodeContext: Rolling your eyes in the first part - the player is relly not getting it.

Transformed_66.text: You're a dead soul walking. I can't help you.
Transformed_66.context: NodeContext: Said with a sneer - the player is dead in a matter of days and you don't care

Transformed_11.text: What about it? I held up my end of the bargain.
Transformed_11.context: NodeContext: Offended at the player's implication. You can do your job perfectly - it's the player's fault in your eyes

Transformed_61.text: It's not my fault the wriggler's tainted by shadow magic. I want nothing to do with you or that scum in your brain.

Transformed_74.speaker: Player
Transformed_74.text: I'm not leaving. This wasn't the deal.

Transformed_2.text: You're bloody right it wasn't. I agreed to remove an illithid spawn. That thing is an abomination.

Transformed_73.text: But let it not be said that Auntie Ethel doesn't honour her debts.
Transformed_73.context: NodeContext: Rolling your eyes, You will give them something - you can't have you repurtation tarnished.

Transformed_43.text: Here. It's on you to fix yourself.
Transformed_43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hold out open palm dramatically. Amulet appears in it suddenly. Gives it to player.

Transformed_14.context: NodeContext: Cold and unrelenting - you're no longer afraid of the player but you don't want them in your house any longer

Transformed_26.speaker: Player
Transformed_26.text: Which is your way of saying - you're not powerful enough.

Transformed_8.text: I'd kill you for that - but why deny your wriggler the pleasure?
Transformed_8.context: NodeContext: A nasty and cruel jab at the player's weakspot

Transformed_13.speaker: Player
Transformed_13.text: Then you're of no use to me.

Transformed_1.text: You don't want to mess with such folk. Trust me - there are worse things than becoming a mind flayer.
Transformed_1.context: NodeContext: Rolling your eyes as the player walks away. You will give them something - you can't have you repurtation tarnished.

Transformed_21.text: Here. Don't let it be said that Auntie doesn't honour her deals. It's on you to fix yourself.
Transformed_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hold out open palm dramatically. Amulet appears in it suddenly. Gives it to player.NodeContext: Grim - you don't want your reputation tarnish, though you think the player is dead either way

Transformed_17.speaker: Player
Transformed_17.text: I thought you could remove it?

Transformed_62.text: I can! But that thing has been touched by more than mind flayers.
Transformed_62.context: NodeContext: Offended at the player's implication. You can do your job perfectly - it's the player's fault in your eyes

Transformed_49.speaker: Player
Transformed_49.text: All the more reason to remove it - or else.

Transformed_50.context: NodeContext: Said with a sneer - the player can do nothing to you

Transformed_38.text: Strong and silent - good. You'll need it for this next bit.

Transformed_59.text: Hah! Oh, you do make me laugh.

Transformed_68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hag took the right eye

Transformed_33.speaker: Player
Transformed_33.text: What in the hells are you?

Transformed_25.text: Close that mouth, precious. Lest you swallow a fly.
Transformed_25.context: NodeContext: You are LOVING the player's surprise. Flirtatious but in a very creepy way.

Transformed_44.speaker: Player
Transformed_44.text: Cute. Am I supposed to be impressed?

Transformed_51.text: Well, yes - I should bloody think so.
Transformed_51.context: NodeContext: Player is not impressed by your transformation. You're shocked. Everyone is always impressed.

Transformed_28.speaker: Player
Transformed_28.text: Give me one reason why I shouldn't cut you down.

Transformed_76.text: Watch that tongue, petal. I bite.
Transformed_76.context: NodeContext: Player has hinted that they'll attack you - you cheerfully, but steel, remind them that you are not one to be messed with

Transformed_67.text: This is my house. And you will mind your manners - or I will use that empty skull of yours as a teapot.

Transformed_37.speaker: Player
Transformed_37.text: A green hag. And a powerful specimen, it seems.

Transformed_35.text: Thank you, petal. It is so lovely to be appreciated.

Transformed_64.text: Magic is the lifeblood of hags. And I'm one of the best.
Transformed_64.context: NodeContext: There is no showboating here. She's powerful and she knows it - this is the truth.

AD_TeleportSurrogateMother_1.text: Come now, Mayrina! Time to go.
AD_TeleportSurrogateMother_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Leaving with Mayrina, i.e. outside of combat.

AD_TeleportSurrogateMother_8.context: InternalNodeContext: Mayrina & hag leave together, Hag is not in combatNodeContext: Mocking tone and wave as you taunt the player.

AD_TeleportSurrogateMother_2.text: Enjoy playing with your new friends. Bye-bye!
AD_TeleportSurrogateMother_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Hag only disappears, no blessings have been turned to curses

AD_TeleportSurrogateMother_3.text: Bye-bye, lovelies! Oh, and enjoy my well water. Hah!
AD_TeleportSurrogateMother_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Hag only disappears, blessings have been turned to poison.NodeContext: Calling out as you gleefully disappear - adding the water note almost as an 'after thought'. The water the player drank turns to poison in their veins - all part of your plan.

AD_Occupied_0.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag, GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHuman
AD_Occupied_0.text: Wait just a moment, sweetie. Auntie is busy.
AD_Occupied_0.context: NodeContext: Someone has tried to talk to you and you've gently asked them to wait. Cheery and pleasant.

PAD_Fled_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Fled_0.text: Where has she gone, I wonder?
